doc.title: Fallow
doc.plot: The year is 2036 and Cassandra is one of the last human inhabitants left on planet Earth. She is determined to find a solution to the defeat of the toxic landscape that surrounds her and the other remaining three people. Fallow portrays a world where nature has been devastated and the food supply has become minimal. Will Cassandra find the power to turn this utter gloom into magical wonder?
